description: Try our easy to follow Prosciutto-Wrapped Apple & Chicken Parcels recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prosciutto-Wrapped Apple & Chicken Parcels Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, melt butter in same frying pan over medium heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant. Add flour and stir to combine. Gradually add juice and stock, stirring constantly, until smooth and combined. Bring to the boil and cook for 2-3 minutes or until sauce thickens slightly. Serve chicken with apple wedges, green beans, sweet potato mash and apple sauce.

Serve chicken with apple wedges, green beans, sweet potato mash and apple sauce.
